page.title: 19A Schoolboy's Day
page.content: My mum has to feed the baby every 4 hours.I do some work for my mum like washing up and making the baby's bed and bringing the baby's bed downstairs and I hoover.My sister looks after the baby as well.I like playing with the baby and I like playing out in the garden with my bike.I like playing in trees and making camps.You make camps out of wood and stones and leaves and grass and mud.When it is ready I crawl inside and it is big enough for 5 people to get in.I let my friends in it and then we make it better inside.We put down some carpet and bring boxes to sit on.Then we get out and do something else like playing on our bikes.When we want a rest we get inside the camp again.I have "Bigtrak" which obeys my commands.We play on the rec where there are trees and swings and a slide.
